channel.title: [Looking for developers] - 2007Reborn - Relive The RS Memories! | ***UPDATED***
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][SIZE=2]Introdution.[/SIZE][/B] Hello rune-server members, i would like to introduce 2007Reborn because of its content its going to have alot of features mostly the stuff wich Runescape 2007 had. I have 6 Thousands $ to spend on this project, so it is not going down, no matter what Jagex or anyone do.
Website : [URL=http://"http://fastdlcscz.vacau.com/2007Reborn/"]Website[/URL] (many bugs, still in need of a web developer).
[SIZE=3][B]Server Progress[/B][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [B]Combat Features[/B]
[COLOR=green]Player vs Player fully complete[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Player vs Npc fully complete[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Perfect max hit formula[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Perfect accuracy formula[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Equipment requirements [/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Every weapon that had spec in 07, have now[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Completeley Bug Free[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [B]Magic Features[/B]
[COLOR=green]Every modern/ancient/lunar combat spell[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Can't mage through walls[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]High & Low alching[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Bones to banans[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [B]Range Features[/B]
[COLOR=green]Every Bows/arrows can be used[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Can't shoot through walls[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [B]Prayer[/B]
[COLOR=green]All bones can be buryed[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Every prayer working properly[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Bones on alters[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Zombie Random[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [B]Mining[/B]
[COLOR=green]Emptying and refilling rocks[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]All ores can be mined[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Prospecting all mines[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Random chance of obtaining gems[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/COLOR] [COLOR=green] Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg)[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [B]Smithing[/B]
[COLOR=green]All bars can be made[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]All bars can be forged into items[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]All equipment can be produced[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]correct interface used, with hovering etc[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [B]Fishing[/B]
[COLOR=green]All fish can be caught.[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Big net fishing[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Correct item requirements[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Fishing spots located all around the world[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Correct animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Moving fishing locations[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Fishing all around the world[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [B]Cooking[/B]
[COLOR=green]Picking wheat[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Filling flour bin[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Bread[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Pizza[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Cakes[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Potatoes[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Eating food (in pieces)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Correct animation and timing used[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] [B]Woodcutting[/B]
[COLOR=green]Stumps and regrowing trees[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Correct hatchet finding[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Correct hatchet animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]All trees cut-able[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [B]Firemaking[/B]
[COLOR=green]All logs light able[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Correct animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Clipped[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [B]Crafting[/B]
[COLOR=green]Leather crafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Full tanning[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Pottery (fired and unfired items)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Gem cutting[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Jewellry making[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [B]Runecrafting[/B]
[COLOR=green]All altars working[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Correct multiple crafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Talismans "pull" to altars[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Tiaras enchanting[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [B]Sounds[/B]
[COLOR=orange]All skilling sounds[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Various attacking sounds[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Music on region of player[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Music fade away, and start the new music[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img] [B]Minigames[/B] [COLOR=green]Castle Wars[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Pest Control[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Fight Caves[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Barrows[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Fight Pits[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Duel Arena[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img] [COLOR=green]Broken axe random[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Bird Nests[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Sand which Lady[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Genie[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Rock Golem[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Spirit Tree[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Zombie[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Evil Chicken[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Random Event Handling System[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] [COLOR=green]Random event handler that works great with all random events[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Skill handler that works great with all skills[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Quest handler that works great with f2p or p2p quests[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Around 10 random events in place as of now[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]All skills done to full completion[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Pickables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Skill interfaces[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Pets[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Working objects all around the world[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]2500 + npcs spawned[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Christmas Crackers[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Holiday events handler[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Working desert[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Single and double doors[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dupe free guarentee (If you find a dupe it will be patched asap).[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Runescape guilds[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]All food that runescape had in 2007[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Normal and ancient magics, ancients is for members only[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]All runescapes shops that were in 2007[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]All runescapes potions[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Correct runescape start[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Sailing[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Gnome Glider[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Bank Pins[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Correct runescape teleports[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Wilderness warning[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]All rings/amulets loaed[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Al kharid/shantay pass w/dialogues & items req[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Tele tabs[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Tele other[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Lots of minigames[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Clipping following/npcs[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Empty handler added for items that can be emptied[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Crystal Chest [/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Flour Mill[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Logging system for every type of thing to make sure no one gets scammed[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Auto Update Cache[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Members Only Benefits[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Runescape prices[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Chat filtering[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Running/w energy + Weight.[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Magic Carpet[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Skill Guides[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Same exp rates as runescape (May be changed if voted for).[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Weapon Poisoning[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Music/Sounds[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [B]Quest's[/B]
[COLOR=green]Dwarf Cannon[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Horror from the deep[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Lost City[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Romeo & Juliet[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Rune mysteri[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]The Mage's Challenge[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Witch's Potion[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Champions Challenge[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Gertrude's Cat[/COLOR] [/CENTER]
[I]The thread will be updated daily, and i just started the source, so don't wonder why it dosen't have that many content YET.[/I]
[SIZE=2]We are in need of developers, please feel free to reply on this thread, or send me a PM![/SIZE]
[B]Current Developers.[/B]
Mudaa [[COLOR=green]Server Sided[/COLOR]] 2007Rebels [[COLOR=green]Server Sided[/COLOR]]
[B]OPEN [Server Sided] OPEN [Website Development] OPEN [Client Development][/B]
[b]Images[/b]
[b]1500+ Dialogues.[/b] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2hg45jn.png[/img]
[b]Dwarf Multi Cannon.[/b] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/fmn9xx.png[/img]
[b]Requirements for items, such as dds etc.[/b] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/s3j7l3.png[/img]
[b]Traveling all over the world.[/b] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/rcm3gp.png[/img]
[b]Castle Wars[/b] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/34g0bau.png[/img]
[b]Clipped Npcs.[/b] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/20fdnpz.jpg[/img]
[b]Patatoes, Cabbage, etc can be picked up.[/b] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/9axwkp.png[/img]
[i]More media comming soon.[/i]

item.title: [Looking for developers] - 2007Reborn - Relive The RS Memories! | ***UPDATED***
item.dc:creator: @ownedin3d ownedin3d
item.description:
@ownedin3d wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=2]Introdution.[/SIZE]
Hello rune-server members, i would like to introduce 2007Reborn because of its content its going to have alot of features mostly the stuff wich Runescape 2007 had. I have 6 Thousands $ to spend on this project, so it is not going down, no matter what Jagex or anyone do.

Website : Website (many bugs, still in need of a web developer).

[SIZE=3]Server Progress[/SIZE]

Combat Features

[COLOR=green]Player vs Player fully complete[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Player vs Npc fully complete[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Perfect max hit formula[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Perfect accuracy formula[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Equipment requirements [/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Every weapon that had spec in 07, have now[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Completeley Bug Free[/COLOR]

Magic Features

[COLOR=green]Every modern/ancient/lunar combat spell[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Can’t mage through walls[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]High & Low alching[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Bones to banans[/COLOR]

Range Features

[COLOR=green]Every Bows/arrows can be used[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Can’t shoot through walls[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/COLOR]

Prayer

[COLOR=green]All bones can be buryed[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Every prayer working properly[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Bones on alters[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Zombie Random[/COLOR]

Mining

[COLOR=green]Emptying and refilling rocks[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]All ores can be mined[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Prospecting all mines[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Random chance of obtaining gems[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green] Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg)[/COLOR]

Smithing

[COLOR=green]All bars can be made[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]All bars can be forged into items[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]All equipment can be produced[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]correct interface used, with hovering etc[/COLOR]

Fishing

[COLOR=green]All fish can be caught.[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Big net fishing[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Correct item requirements[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Fishing spots located all around the world[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Correct animations[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Moving fishing locations[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Fishing all around the world[/COLOR]

Cooking

[COLOR=green]Picking wheat[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Filling flour bin[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Bread[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Pizza[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Cakes[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Potatoes[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Eating food (in pieces)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Correct animation and timing used[/COLOR]

Woodcutting

[COLOR=green]Stumps and regrowing trees[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Correct hatchet finding[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Correct hatchet animations[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]All trees cut-able[/COLOR]

Firemaking

[COLOR=green]All logs light able[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Correct animations[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Clipped[/COLOR]

Crafting

[COLOR=green]Leather crafting[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Full tanning[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Pottery (fired and unfired items)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Gem cutting[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Jewellry making[/COLOR]

Runecrafting

[COLOR=green]All altars working[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Correct multiple crafting[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Talismans “pull” to altars[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Tiaras enchanting[/COLOR]

Sounds

[COLOR=orange]All skilling sounds[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Various attacking sounds[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Music on region of player[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Music fade away, and start the new music[/COLOR]

Minigames
[COLOR=green]Castle Wars[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Pest Control[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Fight Caves[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Barrows[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Fight Pits[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Duel Arena[/COLOR]


[COLOR=green]Broken axe random[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Bird Nests[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Sand which Lady[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Genie[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Rock Golem[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Spirit Tree[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Zombie[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Evil Chicken[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Random Event Handling System[/COLOR]


[COLOR=green]Random event handler that works great with all random events[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Skill handler that works great with all skills[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Quest handler that works great with f2p or p2p quests[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Around 10 random events in place as of now[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]All skills done to full completion[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Pickables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Skill interfaces[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Pets[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Working objects all around the world[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]2500 + npcs spawned[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Christmas Crackers[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Holiday events handler[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Working desert[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Single and double doors[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Dupe free guarentee (If you find a dupe it will be patched asap).[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Runescape guilds[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]All food that runescape had in 2007[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Normal and ancient magics, ancients is for members only[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]All runescapes shops that were in 2007[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]All runescapes potions[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Correct runescape start[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Sailing[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Gnome Glider[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Bank Pins[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Correct runescape teleports[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Wilderness warning[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]All rings/amulets loaed[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Al kharid/shantay pass w/dialogues & items req[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Tele tabs[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Tele other[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Lots of minigames[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Clipping following/npcs[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Empty handler added for items that can be emptied[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Crystal Chest [/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Flour Mill[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Logging system for every type of thing to make sure no one gets scammed[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Auto Update Cache[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Members Only Benefits[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Runescape prices[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Chat filtering[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Running/w energy + Weight.[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Magic Carpet[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Skill Guides[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Same exp rates as runescape (May be changed if voted for).[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Weapon Poisoning[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Music/Sounds[/COLOR]

Quest’s

[COLOR=green]Dwarf Cannon[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Horror from the deep[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Lost City[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Romeo & Juliet[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Rune mysteri[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]The Mage’s Challenge[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Witch’s Potion[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Champions Challenge[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Gertrude’s Cat[/COLOR]
[/CENTER]

The thread will be updated daily, and i just started the source, so don’t wonder why it dosen’t have that many content YET.

[SIZE=2]We are in need of developers, please feel free to reply on this thread, or send me a PM![/SIZE]

Current Developers.

Mudaa [[COLOR=green]Server Sided[/COLOR]]
2007Rebels [[COLOR=green]Server Sided[/COLOR]]

OPEN [Server Sided]
OPEN [Website Development]
OPEN [Client Development]

Images

1500+ Dialogues.

2hg45jn.png769×500

Dwarf Multi Cannon.

fmn9xx.png772×501
